name: self-destruct
effect: User faints, even if the attack fails or misses. Inflicts regular damage.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: Inflicts severe damage but makes the user faint.
flavor_text.emerald: Inflicts severe damage but makes the user faint.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: The user blows up to inflict severe damage, even making itself faint.
